title: SPIRIT Alchemy Tonic Supplement
author: Samantha O
description: Alchemy tonic blend - contemporary and powerful way to be inspired by ancient wisdom.
cleaned_text: Get our inspiration on the regular. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date with tools, recipes, and inspiration to transform and elevate your mind and body. See the divine beauty and love in life and open your heart with this formula. Uplifting and quintessential blend to promote calming and positive state of mind with a sense of true wellness. Alchemy Tonic Supplement Blends - special blends concocted by master blender Yoko Inoue who through years of experience and study has selected the very best herbs in unique formulations to achieve extraordinary results. Our blends are delicious, easy and versatile. Can be mixed with plant based milks, smoothies, desserts or taken as a deeply nourishing tea. See the divine beauty and love in life and open your heart with this formula.
